00019 SYLPH_START_NAMESPACE(Core)
00020 class String;
00021 namespace Serialization {
00022     
00023     class Key : public Object {
00024     public:
00025         Key(const String name) : _name(name) {}
00026         Key(const Key & orig) : _name(orig._name) {}
00027         virtual ~Key() {}
00028         Key & operator=(const String name) { _name = name; return *this; }
00029         inline const String name() const { return _name; }
00030     private:
00031         String _name;
00032     };
00033 }
00034 SYLPH_END_NAMESPACE(Core)
